data.prompt:
Create a minimal flat 3D illustration. Aspect ratio 16:9 (1920x1080). Soft light gray background. Matte pastel geometric shapes (soft blue, mint green, coral, butter yellow) with subtle shadows. Paper-craft layered aesthetic. Only essential elements. ALL ELEMENTS PERFECTLY CENTERED. Friendly, clean, educational. CRITICAL: NO text, NO characters, NO labels, NO numbers. Mathematically precise.

representing the mathematical subtopic "Unit conversion, year 3" designed for Year 8 students.

CONTENT REQUIREMENTS:
- The image MUST visually represent the mathematical concept of "Unit conversion, year 3"
- Use abstract geometric shapes and forms that directly relate to this specific topic
- Ensure the representation is age-appropriate for Year 8
- The visual elements should help students understand "Unit conversion, year 3"

Create a paper-craft style illustration. Aspect ratio 16:9 (1920x1080). Use flat colors with clear layer separation and subtle drop shadows (4-5 colors). Light background with soft, diffused lighting. Elements should appear as cut paper or cardboard layers that represent the mathematical concept. CENTERED COMPOSITION with depth through layering. Friendly, tactile aesthetic. CRITICAL: NO text, NO labels, NO numbers, NO characters. Precise geometric representation only.

representing the mathematical subtopic "Unit conversion, year 3" designed for Year 8 students.

Create a hand-drawn style visualization. Aspect ratio 16:9 (1920x1080). Use chalk-like textures in white, light blue, yellow, and pink on a dark slate background. Elements should have a slightly rough, educational feel while clearly illustrating the concept. ALL ELEMENTS CENTERED with subtle texture. Classroom-inspired aesthetic. CRITICAL: NO text, NO written equations, NO labels, NO numbers. Mathematically correct geometric representation only.

Create a holographic style visualization. Aspect ratio 16:9 (1920x1080). Iridescent gradient background with rainbow shimmer effects (cyan, magenta, yellow transitions). Translucent geometric shapes with prismatic reflections and light refraction. Futuristic, sleek aesthetic with glowing edges. Only essential elements. ALL ELEMENTS PERFECTLY CENTERED and floating. Modern, tech-inspired look. CRITICAL: NO text, NO characters, NO labels, NO numbers. Mathematically precise geometric representation only.
